about_the_game:
Playtest Info

Join Midair 2 playtest now by clicking "Request Access" above and get ready to fly.

Game Info

Midair 2 brings a new dimension to shooters with its high-speed aerial combat using advanced movement and physics to outmaneuver your opponents from every angle. Discover a new way to experience shooters!

True Freedom

Master the art of movement in Midair 2.

With frictionless boots and a powerful jetpack, perform high-speed airborne assaults, dodge enemy fire with precision, and traverse the map effortlessly.

Your jetpack draws from your armor’s energy pool, so strategic management of your energy is crucial for maintaining a combat advantage.

Whether you need a vertical boost or enhanced maneuverability, adapt your jetpack usage to the situation.

Experienced players instinctively balance their jetpack and energy for maximum efficiency.

Teamwork is Critical

Coordination is key in Midair 2.

Formulate strategic assaults to dismantle enemy defenses and secure their flag while defending your own.

Team synergy is vital as enemies adept at the terrain and movement will swiftly infiltrate, seize your flag, and escape. With a reliable team, you can dominate the battlefield.

Get ready for an unparalleled shooter experience with Midair 2. Suit up, power up your jets, and soar to new heights.

Join us in Midair 2 for an exhilarating adventure.

We'll see you in the skies!

name: Midair 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Midair 2 is a fast-paced jetpack fps set in a futuristic sci-fi universe. Use movement and physics to your advantage, outwit your enemy from every angle, you'll never look at a shooter the same way again.
